sentences.en: Her work for charity is highly laudable.
sentences.cn: 她的慈善工作值得高度赞扬.

sentences.en: His kindly help to that child is laudable.
sentences.cn: 他对那个孩子的善意帮助是值得称赞的.

sentences.en: His noble ideas and polite behavior are laudable.
sentences.cn: 他崇高的思想和彬彬有礼的举止令人赞美.

sentences.en: In England it would be laudable to give food and drink to someone who needs it.
sentences.cn: 在英格兰,给需要的人送吃送喝是受人称道的事.

sentences.en: Increased literacy, administrative efficiency, and ease of communication are laudable goals.
sentences.cn: 提高认字人数, 行政效率, 和交流方便都是值得赞赏的目标.

sentences.en: It is highly laudable and exemplary a thing as it is held to be.
sentences.cn: 正如所认为的那样是一件值得高度赞扬和效仿的事情.

sentences.en: It is laudable that the driver slows down when he making a turn at the corner.
sentences.cn: 在拐弯处司机减慢了车速,这种做法很正确.

sentences.en: It's highly laudable and exemplary a thing as it is held to be.
sentences.cn: 这正如所认为的那样是一件值得高度称赞和仿效的事情.

sentences.en: Mr Obama's aspirations may be laudable, but he has several tough years ahead.
sentences.cn: 也许,奥巴马的抱负值得称颂, 但是,他仍然面临着艰难的前景.

sentences.en: Such laudable and honorable strivings are the only real ways to make profit honestly.
sentences.cn: 这种正当和值得赞赏的努力就是诚实谋利的正确途径.

sentences.en: That is a laudable enough aim.
sentences.cn: 这个目标完全值得称赞.
这番雄心壮志令人击掌.

sentences.en: This was his day off and with laudable initiative he had hurried out " to see. "
sentences.cn: 这天他休息,于是就积极主动地跑出城来 “ 看看 ”.

sentences.en: Though so small, there is something laudable about bees.
sentences.cn: 蜜蜂是渺小的; 蜜蜂却又多么高尚啊!

sentences.en: Yet, although the ends are laudable, her means are questionable.
sentences.cn: 然而, 尽管目的值得称道, 她的方法却是令人置疑的.

words.tran_cn: 值得赞赏地；可嘉地；可佩地

trans.tran_en: deserving praise, even if not completely successful
